page.title: 13EMPLOYMENT IN LEUCHARS
page.content: Leuchars and district is dominated by the local RAF station, which is the main employer. Approximately 2000 people are employed on the base, most of whom are servicemen. On the other hand many local people are employed in ancillary jobs, in stores and canteens in the grounds. Naturally the RAF was not very forthcoming with information. At present large numbers are also employed in a major building programme on the airfield. The village shops and services provide work for about 35 full-time staff and a few part-time staff. The local primary school employs 12 teachers and 7 other staff, most of whom travel to work. In common with most villages of this size, a number of people travel to work by car to work in Dundee, St Andrews and Cupar.
